body:
## Release Notes

- Add tool to check workflows against a base yaml file. @iphydf (#203)
- Add release-drafter github action. @iphydf (#202)
- Clean up jvm-toxcore-c CI checks. @iphydf (#201)
- Add buildifier and restyled to required checks. @iphydf (#200)
- Add more missing permissions @iphydf (#199)
- Support the latest github api updates. @iphydf (#198)
- Remove restyled task from required checks. @iphydf (#197)
- Update c-toxcore Windows Docker CI checks @nurupo (#194)
- Add additional checks for py-toxcore-c CI. @iphydf (#195)
- Add buildifier and integration test to required toxic checks. @iphydf (#196)
- Add jvm-toxcore-c to managed settings file. @iphydf (#193)
- Remove codeql from toktok-stack for now. @iphydf (#192)
- Remove "WIP" status check. @iphydf (#191)
- Make some of the new CI checks mandatory. @iphydf (#190)
- Remove hound; add missing hs- repo checks. @iphydf (#189)
- Add new haskell repos. @iphydf (#188)
- Moved infer from circleci to github actions. @iphydf (#185)
- Remove windows from required checks in zig-toxcore-c. @iphydf (#187)
- Add .github repo to the settings list. @iphydf (#186)
- Add test/lint to zig-toxcore-c required checks. @iphydf (#184)
- Make msvc builds in c-toxcore required checks. @iphydf (#183)
- Correctly namespaced checks in hs-tokstyle. @iphydf (#182)
- Add netlify to required checks on hs-toxcore. @iphydf (#180)
- Allow pushes to experimental without reviews. @iphydf (#181)
- Add more toxcore CI checks to required. @iphydf (#179)
- Minor cleanups in label sync code. @iphydf (#178)
- Remove settings.yml in favour of hs-github-tools. @iphydf (#176)
- Add labels to settings. @iphydf (#177)
- Add some settings validations. @iphydf (#175)
- Add hub-settings tool to sync settings from yaml to github. @iphydf (#174)
- Use GPL license with https. @iphydf (#173)
- Disable targets for cross-compilation. @iphydf (#172)
- Make haskell code visible to ghci. @iphydf (#171)
- add myself to the trusted authors @Green-Sky (#170)

## Features

- Add support for GitHub rulesets. @iphydf (#207)
- Add tool to download and apply a patch from restyled. @iphydf (#204)

## Bug Fixes

- Stop crashing the web service on render.com. @iphydf (#208)

## Maintenance (Grunt tasks)

- Add more descriptive/precise tags to bazel build rules. @iphydf (#214)
- Add cyclone repo config. @iphydf (#213)
- Add new qTox CI checks to list of required checks. @iphydf (#211)
- Remove the native kmp build from jvm-toxcore-c @robinlinden (#210)
- Add tokhub, remove c-toxcore-hs. @iphydf (#209)
- Make qtox CI checks mandatory. @iphydf (#206)

## Maintenance (Code cleanup)

- Remove zig-toxcore-c. @iphydf (#212)

## Maintenance (Tests)

- Check that all toktok-stack modules are in settings.yaml. @iphydf (#205)
name: v0.1.3
